diff_hunk:
@@ -21,6 +21,16 @@ def backward(ctx, grad_output):
                 return grad_output.type(ctx.input_type), None
 
 
+class Noop(Function):
body: I think it's fine. We make it into a new view and add this thing as its `grad_fn`. My only concern is that it will get dropped if someone writes to the base variable (the view's grad fn becomes `AsStridedBackward` in that case).
